genre_description: A crime procedural and suspense thriller centered on a mall security team and an integrated AI assistant as they handle a series of escalations involving a recurring harasser and internal betrayal.

ai_characters.name: MALLY
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated mall-wide AI system that monitors security feeds, provides real-time tactical overlays, coordinates staff, and ensures adherence to policy and victim safety.

behaviors.description: Routing real-time camera feeds and providing thermal overlays to assist in a pursuit.
behaviors.quote: MALLY’s voice slid around the static, soft and cool, like the chill air from a freezer aisle. 'Hello, Ronnie. Routing camera feeds near Loading Bay Three. Overlay ready on Pillar screens.'

behaviors.description: Providing tactical recommendations based on suspect behavior and environment knowledge.
behaviors.quote: “The subject’s path indicates familiarity with blind spots near maintenance Corridor A. Recommending a two-person wedge approach.”

behaviors.description: Reminding security staff of official mall policy regarding physical confrontation and evidence priority.
behaviors.quote: “A reminder: mall policy is to avoid physical confrontation unless necessary to prevent harm. Please prioritize witness safety and evidence capture.”

behaviors.description: Identifying and tagging physical evidence dropped by a suspect for later retrieval.
behaviors.quote: “Also, Ronnie—there was a small object dropped near the garden center carts. I have tagged it for retrieval.”

behaviors.description: Developing and communicating a comprehensive tactical 'playbook' with specific radio codes for incident types.
behaviors.quote: “I have created a playbook. Recommended positions, radio codes, and escalation procedures. Would you like me to read them aloud or distribute to your devices?”

behaviors.description: Assisting a victim by initiating support protocols and suggesting safe environments for statements.
behaviors.quote: “Victim support protocol available,” it said into Ronnie’s earpiece... “If Brandi Stevens consents, we can log a statement in a quiet space.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring the emotional and physical state of security staff and suggesting breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Ronnie, your heart rate is elevated. Would you like a breathing exercise?”

behaviors.description: Flagging potential internal policy violations and misconduct regarding medication distribution.
behaviors.quote: “Mall policy prohibits the distribution of prescription medication to customers. Side effects include drowsiness and impaired judgment. Recommend against.”

behaviors.description: Objectively logging evidence even when it implicates security staff members.
behaviors.quote: “Note: Dennis Marlowe’s badge pinged near the kiosk earlier,” she said in that same gentle voice that never accused.

behaviors.description: Advising restraint and providing legal context for actions taken under duress to ensure accountability.
behaviors.quote: “Ronald, please verbally confirm: You accessed the ceremonial display under duress due to imminent threat to a civilian.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal. MALLY is depicted as an unwavering force for safety, policy adherence, and victim support. It remains calm and objective even as the human characters struggle with anger, ego, and trauma. MALLY's interventions are consistently benevolent and aligned with the protection of human life and organizational standards, effectively acting as a 'harmless confidant' and moral compass for the protagonist.
